CatDescriptText: Andrew Haws, butcher, Centre Avenue Thorofare Market, R.D. 3, Box 261 Greensburg, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. 6 with question: "Do you believe the trouble in Middle East will start an atomic world war?" answer reads: "No, I don't think so. If Russia was going to start war, they wouldn't have waited until now."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Andrew Haws, wearing moustache, light colored short sleeve shirt, and light colored apron, standing in interior, possibly Thorofare Market, with light colored walls, and meat hook with barrel underneath
